snippet: A social-science journal invited Jean M. Twenge and one of her most prominent critics, Jeffrey Arnett, to debate the levels of narcissism in today’s emerging adults.
lead_paragraph: A social-science journal invited Jean M. Twenge and one of her most prominent critics, Jeffrey Arnett, to debate the levels of narcissism in today’s emerging adults.

headline.main: A Back and Forth About Narcissism
